Coordinates for the Tubatse hydroelectric plant located in Greater Tubatse Local Municipality, Sekhukhune District Municipality, Limpopo, South Africa. Web search geocoded. Source: https://thediggings.com/mines/usgs10183144. The Tubatse Smelter is a notable processing plant within the mining industry, established in 1974

web_search_companies.notes: Tubatse Ferrochrome Pty. Ltd. is the operating company, while Gencor and Samancor are also listed as owners.
